name: Cycling 2 days BenTre
description: Cycling home-stay Mekong Delta. Most locals living along the river bank, They use waterway as a main mean of transport. That’s why boats are more important than motorcycles and bicycle in the rural area. Please, join us to see the daily life on Mekong River and its people.|The Mekong Delta is the southernmost region of Vietnam. It is often referred to as the rice bowl of Vietnam as it produces three harvests per year. The fertile Mekong Delta is also famous for its tropical fruits and flowers gardens. Cycling is a great way to see the countryside and life of the locals. This 2 day trip is a combination of an easy biking tour & Home stay at a local house.
